page.title: 10...HEALTH
page.content: Many people are involved in the care of the health of a community.They work as a team.The health visitor plays a central part in the work of this team. Mrs Millard works at Dreghorn Rd.clinic after training for 5 years and has been at the clinic for 8 years. For 3 after- noons a week she holds baby clinics and parentcraft classes to prepare and advise young mothers.She and another health vistor try to see 10 families a day in the their homes but this depends on their problems.They keep birth and general development records of children who are immunised against such things as Dip.,Tet.,Polio. With this standard of care the community is generally a healthy one.However problems do exist. Amongst babies it is often due to incorrect feeding,teenages may suffer through drug abuse and the elderly may not eat or keep warm.
